name: nikola tesla
description:
Nikola tesla (Serbian language: slay slay slay slay slay slay; July 10, 1858-7, 1943) was an inventor, physicist, mechanical engineer, and serbian-american electrical engineer. [3][4][5][6] it is famous for its contribution to the design of alternating current electricity systems.[7]
 
 Born and raised in the Austrian empire, tesla completed his education in engineering and physics in the 1870's. He worked briefly in the telefoni field in the early 1880's and at continental Edison in the power industry. He moved to the United States in 1884 and was later naturalized as a citizen. He was at the Edison machine works in New York City before deciding to quit. With a partner's help for the financing and marketing of his ideas, tesla set up a laboratory in New York to develop various wooden and mechanical devices. The alternated current induction motor and its reverse polyifasa patents were licensed by Westinghouse electric in 1888.
